about_the_game:
This DLC contains the full versions of all the soundtracks from "MOMO.EXE" created for you by "myuu". You can easily play it by Steam Music Player. You can also find the MP3 versions in your game folder.

Track list (6 total):
1. myuu - Charming Strain;
2. myuu - Cornered;
3. myuu - Happy Birthday Song (Creepy Piano);
4. myuu - The Crypt (Horror Soundscape);
5. myuu - Unknown (Horror Ambience);
6. myuu - You're next

Buying the DLC you support the developer.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 (x64)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: MOMO.EXE - Official Soundtrack DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (x64)
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This DLC contains the full versions of all the soundtracks from "MOMO.EXE" created for you by "myuu". You can easily play it by Steam Music Player. You can also find the MP3 versions in your game folder.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian
